name: Inverted Souls
description:
Well it's my first game on itch.io and I wanted to release something.

And here is Inverted Souls a 2D Platformer where your soul split in two. Your goal is to finish all quests and reunite with your other soul.It's simple. I hope you like it. It's still in progress :)

Credits:

Concept & Map by
https://itch.io/profile/tsukidev

Music by
Azons

Voice by
hopesalat
